The default politeness settings are running on hostname-level.
The level to=
 apply these settings on is defined in the so called QueueAssignmentPolicy
=

So - to obtain a greater speed on a single host you need another QueueAssi=
gnmentPolicy that does not put URLs in queues based on the hostname

For th=
is use can use:
org.archive.crawler.frontier.BucketQueueAssignmentPolicy

T=
his one distributes URLs in a greater number of queues based on a hash of t=
he URL I think. Be aware that this will put the load on a single host quite=
 high. The only parameter you can then control in practise is the overall s=
peed-limits.

best

my team is=
 performing some tests with Heritrix 1.14.4. We need to crawl a single host=
